designs.name: Corporate Luxury Executive Office
designs.description: Premium executive office reflecting authority, elegance, and success
designs.flooring: Polished marble or premium wooden flooring
designs.walls: Textured wall panels with veneer and accent lighting
designs.ceiling: Designer false ceiling with cove lighting
designs.lighting: Warm ambient lighting, designer table lamp
designs.furniture: Executive desk, leather chair, visitor chairs, credenza
designs.prompt_keywords: luxury executive office, premium corporate cabin, leadership workspace

designs.name: Modern Executive Office
designs.description: Sleek, contemporary office with clean lines and professional appeal
designs.furniture: Minimal executive desk, ergonomic chair, storage units
designs.prompt_keywords: modern executive office, clean corporate cabin

designs.name: Classic Traditional Executive Office
designs.description: Timeless executive office inspired by traditional leadership spaces
designs.furniture: Large wooden desk, leather chair, bookshelf
designs.prompt_keywords: classic executive office, traditional corporate cabin

designs.name: Glass Cabin Executive Office
designs.description: Transparent executive cabin promoting openness and modern leadership
designs.furniture: Sleek desk, ergonomic chair, meeting table
designs.prompt_keywords: glass cabin executive office, transparent leadership space

designs.name: Industrial Executive Office
designs.description: Bold executive office with industrial character and authority
designs.prompt_keywords: industrial executive office, bold corporate cabin

designs.name: Minimal Power Executive Office
designs.description: Minimalist executive office emphasizing clarity and control
designs.prompt_keywords: minimal executive office, powerful clean workspace

designs.name: Biophilic Executive Office
designs.description: Nature-inspired executive office promoting calm leadership
designs.prompt_keywords: biophilic executive office, nature inspired leadership space

designs.name: Tech-Smart Executive Office
designs.description: High-tech executive office with smart automation and controls
designs.flooring: Polished concrete or smart wood flooring
designs.walls: Matte walls with integrated smart panels
designs.prompt_keywords: smart executive office, automated corporate cabin

designs.name: Executive Office with Meeting Focus
designs.description: Executive cabin designed for leadership meetings and discussions
designs.furniture: Executive desk, meeting table, visitor chairs
designs.prompt_keywords: executive office meeting room, leadership discussion space

designs.name: Cost-Effective Executive Office
designs.description: Functional executive office balancing budget and authority
designs.prompt_keywords: budget executive office, functional corporate cabin
